helpLabels.label: Select projects to be referenced. Their metadata will be extracted when rendering the portfolio.

properties.property: SELECT * FROM nxtrProject WHERE dc:title ILIKE ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'
